titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

action.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Isakson. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 1/21/2015--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs for the 114th Congress.
